) B ) A

mapper.select: SELECT A.QNA_BOARD_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, A.WRITE_DATE, A.CHANGE_DATE, SUBCODE_TO_NAME(A.ANSWER_STATE) AS ANSWER_STATE, ANSWER_STATE AS STATE, A.VIEW_CNT, B.ATTACHED_FILE_NO, B.SERVER_FILE_NAME, B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME, B.FILE_PATH, B.REGISTER_DATE FROM QNA_BOARD A LEFT JOIN ATTACHED_FILE B ON A.QNA_BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND B.BOARD_TYPE = 'N005' WHERE A.QNA_BOARD_NO = #{qnaBoardNo}
